channel.title: [PI] Npc Dialouge Problems [PI] Rep++
channel.description: I have a little problem with my dialouges on my PI server, this problem has never occured before. So I click on the npc and for example the NPC says "Merry Christmas, How are you?" And the two options are then displayed, one saying "Great!" and the other saying "Bad" But the problem is that it only lets me select the bottom 'Bad' one, not the top one. What did I do wrong?

item.title: [PI] Npc Dialouge Problems [PI] Rep++
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Typhis Lord Typhis
item.description:
@Lord_Typhis wrote:

In ActionHandler.java I added:

case 2244: c.getDH().sendDialogues(700,npcType); break;In Clickingbuttons.java I added:
if(c.dialogueAction == 702) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(703, 2244); return; } (For 1st choice)
(for 2nd choice)

if(c.dialogueAction == 702) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(704, 2244); return; }

What did I do wrong?

Read full topic
